com.samsung.android.sdk.healthdata

Class HealthDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.healthdata.HealthDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public final class HealthDevice
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    This class represents device information that provides health data. It is used to identify the data source for each HealthData.

    The device that installs an application for Samsung Digital Health is registered automatically by the Health data framework. If there is a new source device that provides health data, the device needs to be registered with HealthDevice.Builder.build() and HealthDeviceManager.registerDevice(HealthDevice).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HealthDevice.Builder
      This class is a builder to configure HealthDevice.

      • getUuid

        public String getUuid()
        Gets a unique ID of the device. The ID is generated from the seed information when the device is registered.
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the device, or null if the device is not registered

      • getGroup

        public int getGroup()
        Gets the group of the device.
        Returns:

        • GROUP_EXTERNAL
        • GROUP_COMPANION
